comments.content: The link's not working for me.

T

Frutiger Black looks like a perfect match to me.   
   
Eduardo, the 'J' on Lucinda Sans goes below the baseline (doesn't in the sample Tom gave).

I have to agree with Eduardo on this one. [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111075950/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/lucida-sans/bold/testdrive.html?s=HFMJ%c6PS&p=72) is a slightly better sample (with the proper AE character). To my eye, all the characters match the sample perfectly except for the long tail on the J and the bottom of the bowl of the P is slightly different. Both of these changes would be easy to do in a graphics program.
